      <h1 class="centered-heading margin-bottom-32px" style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 32px; font-size: 35px; font-weight: 600; line-height: 52px; color: #5a96e3; text-align: center;">ABOUT OUR PROJECT</h1>
      <div style="text-align: left;">
        <p class="margin-bottom-24px" style="margin-bottom: 24px; color: #57585a;">The latest <a href="https://vast-challenge.github.io/2023/"><strong>Vast Challenge 2023</strong></a> explores into illegal, unreported, and unregulated (IUU) fishing as it is a major contributor to overfishing worldwide. These activities pose a threat not only to fragile marine ecosystems, but also to food security in coastal communities and regional stability more broadly. </p>
        <p class="margin-bottom-24px" style="margin-bottom: 24px; color: #57585a;">In particular, our group would be focusing on the VAST Challenge <a href="https://vast-challenge.github.io/2023/MC3.html">Mini Challenge 3</a>, where <strong>FishEye International</strong>, a non-profit focused on countering IUU fishing, has been given access to an international finance corporation's database on fishing-related companies. Our group has undertaken the task to help FishEye conduct a visual analytics study and exploration with the aim to identify fishing business anomalies that could indicate a company is involved in IUU.</p>
        <p class="margin-bottom-24px" style="margin-bottom: 24px; color: #57585a;">As part of our analysis, we developed a interactive web application using Shiny and R. It would help FishEye International better visualise the graph data and further explore relationships of the fishing-related comapnies.</p>
      </div>
    </div>

         <h2 class="section-heading" style="margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 36px; font-weight: 600; line-height: 50px; color: #5a96e3;">SHINY APP</h2>
         <p class="paragraph-light" style="margin-bottom: 10px; opacity: .6;">
  Our Web Application runs on <a href="https://shiny.posit.co/r/getstarted/shiny-basics/lesson1/index.html">R Shiny package</a> and allows users to draw insights through visual analytics, uncover anomalies, and identify suspicious companies that could be partaking in illegal fishing activities.</p>
  <ul style="margin-bottom: 10px; opacity: .6;">
  <li>Section 1 (Dashboard): Provides a comprehensive overview of key insights drawn.</li>
  <li>Section 2 (Network Analysis): Explores the business relationships between individuals and companies and allows us to locate anomalous companies.</li>
  <li>Section 3 (Topic Analysis): Utilizes topic modeling to categorize the companies' products and services into different topics.</li>
  <li>Section 4 (Deep-dive investigation): Allows users to search for an individual/company, view its network, and obtain key insights.</li>
</ul>

         <a href="https://junsok21.shinyapps.io/ShinyAppsGroup11/" class="w-button" style="display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #5a96e3; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; border-radius: 4px; text-align: left;">EXPLORE NOW</a>
      </div>

      <div class="container-2" style="margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center;">
         <h2 class="centered-heading" style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 24px; font-size: 36px; font-weight: 600; line-height: 50px; color: #5a96e3; text-align: center; width: 100%;">Thank you note & References</h2>
         <p class="centered-subheading" style="margin-bottom:30px;max-width:650px;text-align:center;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;"><strong>1. </strong>To Prof Kam: Thank you for kindly spending time to advise us whenever we were stuck in this project. Especially with prototyping, a critical deployment issue, and feedback for improvement around Event Reactive functions</p>
                  <p class="centered-subheading" style="margin-bottom:30px;max-width:650px;text-align:center;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;"><strong>2. </strong>We would also like to extend our gratitude to our classmate Fang Xian for producing high quality work around topic modeling in her <a href="https://isss608-chenfx.netlify.app/take-home_ex/take-home_ex03/take-home_ex03#topic-modelling">take-home 3 submission</a>.
